Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.input

Data Sources for Stock Data
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IReader  
    IReaderEx  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlphaVantageReader
    https://www.alphavantage.co/documentation/#dailyadj example: https://www.alphavantage.co/query?function=TIME_SERIES_DAILY_ADJUSTED&symbol=MSFT&datatype=csv&apikey=demo timestamp,open,high,low,close,adjusted_close,volume,dividend_amount,split_coefficient 2018-05-22,97.6800,98.1700,97.2000,97.5950,97.5950,9711773,0.0000,1.0000 2018-05-21,97.0000,98.0100,96.8000,97.6000,97.6000,18996380,0.0000,1.0000
    CombinedReader
    Reads the stock data from multiple sources.
    HttpReader
    Reader to load the stock history via HTTP from a url
    IEXReader
    Read data from https://iextrading.com/developer/docs/#iex-api-1-0
    MarketArchiveFileReader
    Reader to load the stock history from MarketArchive files
    MarketArchiveHttpReader
    Reader to load the stock history from MarketArchive files
    QuandlBSEReader
    Reader to load the stock history from Quandl Stock prices and indices from the BSE (formerly the Bombay Stock Exchange).
    QuandlEuronextReader
    Reader to load the stock history from MarketArchive files
    QuandlReader
    Reader to load the stock history from MarketArchive files
    QuandlSixReader
    Reader to load the stock history from MarketArchive files
    QuandlWIKIReader
    Reader to load the stock history from MarketArchive files
    YahooReader
    Reader which provides the stock data from Yahoo
